sentences.en: An operation finally cured his shin injury.
sentences.cn: 手术最终治好了他胫部的伤。

sentences.en: Football players often wear shin guards.
sentences.cn: 足球运动员经常穿着护腿.

sentences.en: He bruised his shin knocking against the chair.
sentences.cn: 他脚杆骨撞到椅子而受瘀伤.

sentences.en: He had the words "Angie loves Ian" tattooed on his left shin.
sentences.cn: 他在左小腿上文了“安吉爱伊恩”几个字。

sentences.en: He hurried into the hall, banging his shin against a chair in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 他匆匆步入大厅，黑暗中小腿撞到了一把椅子上。

sentences.en: He kicked his brother on the shin.
He made a remarkable recovery from a shin injury.
sentences.cn: 他的胫骨伤恢复得相当不错。

sentences.en: He sheathed the knife and strapped it to his shin.
sentences.cn: 他将刀插入鞘中，绑在小腿上。
他噌的一下爬到了一棵树上。

sentences.en: His elbow was poking through his torn shin sleeve.
sentences.cn: 他的肘从衬衫的破袖子中露出.

sentences.en: I barked my shin on a tree stump.
sentences.cn: 我磕到了树桩上,胫部擦破了皮.

sentences.en: In the darkness he stumbled his shin against the bed post.
sentences.cn: 黑暗中他的小腿绊在了床柱上.

sentences.en: May I record the class sessions at Shin Dance?
sentences.cn: 我可以在上课期间录像 吗 ?

sentences.en: Mr Shin's analysis of Northern Rock contains some fascinating detail on the retail - deposit run.
sentences.cn: Shin对诺森洛克的分析包含一些关于零售存款业务有趣的细节.

sentences.en: Sampras awaits the results of a bone scan on a painful left shin.
sentences.cn: 桑普拉斯等待着疼痛的左腿胫骨的骨骼扫描结果。

sentences.en: She punched him on the nose and kicked him in the shins.
sentences.cn: 她猛击了他的鼻子又踢了他的胫部。

sentences.en: The horse kicked him on the shin.

trans.tran_en: the front part of your leg between your knee and your foot
to climb quickly up or down a tree, pole etc by using your hands and legs
